localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
blogPost.body: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
blogPost.title: La Touche Musicale - You can learn piano online easily with the songs you love
blogPost.author: Joris Astier

localize.description: 无需钢琴谱的直观方法 不再需要知道如何解读钢琴谱或了解乐理。在几秒钟内，你就能认出要在键盘上演奏的音符。超过1,000首各种风格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜欢的歌曲轻松地在网上学习钢琴。

localize.description: 無需鋼琴譜的直觀方法 不再需要知道如何解讀鋼琴譜或瞭解樂理。在幾秒鐘內，你就能認出要在鍵盤上演奏的音符。超過1,000首各種風格和技巧水平的歌曲。
localize.tagline: 你可以用你喜歡的歌曲輕鬆地在網上學習鋼琴。

previous.excerpt: A single link for founders that allows investors to commit and send funds online. Once the Roll Up Vehicle (RUV) closes, AngelList sends one single wire to the company.
previous.title: Roll Up Vehicles by AngelList - A single link for all your angel investors

localize.description: 为创始人提供一个单一的链接，让投资人可以在线承诺和发送资金。一旦卷帘车(RUV)关闭，AngelList就会向公司发送一条单线。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有天使投资人提供单一链接

localize.description: 爲創始人提供一個單一的鏈接，讓投資人可以在線承諾和發送資金。一旦捲簾車(RUV)關閉，AngelList就會向公司發送一條單線。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有天使投資人提供單一鏈接

next.excerpt: This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design. You can download Figma Beta to use interactive components.
next.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion

localize.description: 这个文件包含了一系列在Figma中使用交互式组件的实验，以在你的设计中创建一些运动。你可以下载Figma Beta来使用交互式组件。
localize.tagline: Figma中的交互式组件创建运动

localize.description: 這個文件包含了一系列在Figma中使用交互式組件的實驗，以在你的設計中創建一些運動。你可以下載Figma Beta來使用交互式組件。
localize.tagline: Figma中的交互式組件創建運動
